pullrequest.title: Add ability to save worlds to SDFormat

content.raw:
@{557058:90bc87b0-2886-4377-a17c-3a6629a697ff} , I added a path validator on 89a7882. 

* The ok button is only enabled if the path starts with `file:///` and ends with `.sdf`
* The user can't type a URL that wouldn't be at least partially valid. For example, they can't type `banana`, they keys won't register. But they can type `file:///tmp`, because that's a valid beginning for a path.

The user can still write invalid paths, like `file:///lala.sdf`, and the UI won't explain what happened, but I think that was also the case before. And this URI scheme will be confusing for Windows users - I suggest we revisit this later.
